targets.expr:
(
  sum by (job,device_name) (
  irate(kentik_snmp_ifHCOutOctets{job=~"$job",device_name=~"$instance"} [$__rate_interval])
)
)*8

# set max limit to workaround for TB-PB/sec spikes when counters are overloaded too quickly on very busy interfaces.
<100*10^9

(
  sum by (job,device_name) (
  irate(kentik_snmp_ifHCInOctets{job=~"$job",device_name=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)
)*8

# set max limit to workaround for TB-PB/sec spikes when counters are overloaded too quickly on very busy interfaces.
<100*10^9

sum by (job,device_name) (irate(kentik_snmp_ifOutErrors{job=~"$job",device_name=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) +
sum by (job,device_name) (irate(kentik_snmp_ifInErrors{job=~"$job",device_name=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) +
sum by (job,device_name) (irate(kentik_snmp_ifInDiscards{job=~"$job",device_name=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) +
sum by (job,device_name) (irate(kentik_snmp_ifOutDiscards{job=~"$job",device_name=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))

count by (instance,job)(
  count by (job,instance,alertname) (max_over_time(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", severity="warning", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * on(job,instance) group_left group by (job,instance) (sysUpTime{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})

)

count by (instance,job)(
  count by (job,instance,alertname) (max_over_time(ALERTS{alertstate="firing", severity="critical", job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * on(job,instance) group_left group by (job,instance) (sysUpTime{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance"})

)

targets.refId: Network interface unknown protocol in packets dropped
